column1: The family will receive friends on Wednesday
column3: 2015 from 10:00 a.m. until 11:00 a.m. at Mt. Zion OFWB Church followed by a service celebrating her life in the sanctuary of Mt. Zion OFWB Church with the Rev. Fred Allen and Rev. Lewis Godwin officiating. Interment will follow at the Buckhorn Cemetery.
